00336 #ifndef MODULE_ONLY
00337 inline double stf::window(double n, double N) {
00338     return 1.0-(pow((2.0*n-N)/N,2.0));
00339 }
00340 
00341 inline int stf::pow2(int arg) {return 1<<arg;}

00347 template <typename T>
00348 void SWAP(T s1, T s2) {
00349     T aux=s1;
00350     s1=s2;
00351     s2=aux;
00352 }
00353 
00354 template <class T>
00355 std::vector<T>
00356 stf::cubicSpline(const std::vector<T>& y,
00357         T oldF,
00358         T newF)
00359 {
00360     double factor_i=newF/oldF;
00361     int size=(int)y.size();
00362     // size of interpolated data:
00363     int size_i=(int)(size*factor_i);
00364     Vector_double x(size);
00365     Vector_double y_d(size);
00366     for (int n_p=0; n_p < size; ++n_p) {
00367         x[n_p]=n_p;
00368         y_d[n_p]=y[n_p];
00369     }
00370     Vector_double y_i(stf::spline_cubic_set(x,y_d,0,0,0,0));
00371 
00372     std::vector<T> y_if(size_i);
00373     Vector_double x_i(size_i);
00374 
00375     //Cubic spline interpolation:
00376     for (int n_i=0; n_i < size_i; ++n_i) {
00377         x_i[n_i]=(double)n_i * (double)size/(double)size_i;
00378         double yp, ypp;
00379         y_if[n_i]=(T)stf::spline_cubic_val(x,x_i[n_i],y_d,y_i,yp,ypp);
00380     }
00381     return y_if;
00382 }
00383 
00384 template <class T>
00385 std::vector<T> stf::diff(const std::vector<T>& input, T x_scale) {
00386     std::vector<T> diffVA(input.size()-1);
00387     for (unsigned n=0;n<diffVA.size();++n) {
00388         diffVA[n]=(input[n+1]-input[n])/x_scale;
00389     }
00390     return diffVA;
00391 }

00393 template <typename T>
00394 inline T stf::SQR(T a) {return a*a;}
